TopicTitle: Angles needed for a slingshot maneuver past Mun and Minmus.

Articles.Content:
Hi guys! I'm working on figuring out how to slingshot craft past the the mun. I've pretty much got that down, but I'm wondering if any of you can consistently slingshot past the Mun and Minmus in one pass. Any information would be really helpful. Thanks!

http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/559825079551196509/D2764489392347391D183FCCCE9B4A07656793D8/
